entry.title: Putin Wants His Hit Man Back
entry.content: Moscow seeks the return of a covert operative serving a life sentence in Germany, possibly in exchange for Wall Street Journal reporter Evan Gershkovich and others held by Russia.

entry.title: World's Top School Systems Try to Ease Pressure on Students
entry.content: The world’s most competitive school systems, known for their hard-driving approach and top-notch academic results, are easing up.

entry.title: Covid-19 Rises Again, and Masks Are Back on the Table
entry.content: The rise in Covid-19 is a reminder that the virus retains power to disrupt learning and work.

entry.title: Hotter Summers Kill Thousands in a Europe With Scant Air Conditioning
entry.content: Climate change is warming Europe twice as fast as the global average, leaving vulnerable populations at risk of deadly complications when temperatures climb.
